sentences.en: a young man with a naturally equable temperament
He demanded that they be better more candid, more equable, more capable of seeing.
sentences.cn: 只要求人比实际高尚些--更正直, 更平心静气, 更能辨别是非.

sentences.en: He was a fine person to work with and he was very equable and a patient man.
sentences.cn: 他是个非常平和而且有耐心的人，和他一起工作很愉快。

sentences.en: He was a man of the most equable temper.
sentences.cn: 他是个脾气非常好的人。

sentences.en: He was too equable to fret over the demands that were laid on him.
sentences.cn: 他心平气和,不因众说纷纭而坐立不安.

sentences.en: His spirits were always equable and he was an observant person.
sentences.cn: 他的精神总是平稳的,并且他又是个循规蹈矩的人.

sentences.en: I like working with Edward because he's so calm and equable.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢和爱得华一起工作,因为他性情沉着稳重.

sentences.en: It's lucky that his parents are so equable.
sentences.cn: 值得庆幸的是他双亲性情非常温和.

sentences.en: Lord Gilbey surveyed with equable disapproval the slashing rain, the lowering clouds, the seething summer trees.
sentences.cn: 吉尔贝勋爵平静地露出了不满的情绪,审视着瓢泼大雨, 黑压压的浓云, 郁郁葱葱的夏令树木.

sentences.en: The Bouvier is an equable dog, steady, resolute and fearless.
sentences.cn: 法兰德斯畜牧犬是平静的品种, 坚定 、 坚决且勇敢.

sentences.en: The climate has grown more equable and the crop yields have risen.
sentences.cn: 天气变得更加温和，粮食产量也已经提高。

sentences.en: The speaker, calm and equable, claimed that he would campaign for equitable treatment of all citizens.
sentences.cn: 发言的人心平气和地宣布他要为全体公民的公正待遇而竞选.

sentences.en: Yet he was equable, as those elements were not.
sentences.cn: 不过他是公平的, 因为其他因素也一样,没什么特别.

trans.tran_cn: 变化小的，宁静的，温和的，稳定的
trans.tran_en: someone who is equable remains calm and happy and does not often get annoyed
